title: Professor Cline
description: Getting pleasure from pain makes me a sadist. I’ve been that way for as long as I can remember. Plagued by painful memories and a dark past, I use women to help me forget. I’ve done everything in my power to take control of my life, but there are some things I have no control over.People think they know who I am, but in reality, they know nothing.My name is Mason Cline.But after today, you will call me Professor Cline.
author: J.M. LaRocca
